body_html:
CopyGPUTensorToCPUSync is a synchronous wrapper for GPUUtil::CopyGPUTensorToCPU.
It was stuck only because CopyGPUTensorToCPU did not complete or did not send notification.
But grpc uses CopyGPUTensorToCPU, not sure why this is not an issue.

It was stuck only because CopyGPUTensorToCPU did not complete or did not send notification.
But grpc uses CopyGPUTensorToCPU, not sure why this is not an issue.
body:
CopyGPUTensorToCPUSync  is a synchronous wrapper for GPUUtil::CopyGPUTensorToCPU.
It was stuck only because CopyGPUTensorToCPU did not complete or did not send notification.
But grpc uses CopyGPUTensorToCPU, not sure why this is not an issue.
